500.description: origin BASE (was originally #008146, darkened by 2% black to meet accessibility requirements)

025.description: origin (Currently only used on Tile Select)

500.description: Reference only. Do not use in components.

1000.description: Reference only. Do not use in components.

000.description: Reference only. Do not use in components.

100.description: Action popover (menu), Anchor navigation, Button: minor (including button bar), Button: multi-action & split (menu), Button toggle: minor, Card (less rounded), Card select (single), Card select group (outer corners), Carousel (slides), Color picker standard (container), Menu (bottom corners), Message, Navigation: top (menu bottom corners), Navigation: left (selected menu), Pagination, Tab, Table, Tile (less rounded), Toast.

200.description: Carousel (outer part), Card (more rounded), Color picker advanced (outer container), Dialog (not full screen), Tile (more rounded).

400.description: Action popover (button), Button: major (including button bar), Button: multi-action & split, Button toggle: major, Loader bar, Progress tracker, Switch.

000.description: Button groups (internal/adjacent corners), Card select group (internal/adjacent corners), File input (integrated base bar top corners).

050.description: Checkbox (large), Color picker advanced (inner container), Date picker, Date range, Dropdown: select (trigger & menu), File input, Link (focus), Search, Text area, Text input, Tooltip.
